function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Use of HEPA filters and pre-filters in built environments","Impact":"Potential for ineffective removal of contaminants and pollutants, leading to increased risk of disease transmission","Mitigation":"Regular maintenance and replacement of filters, use of additional filtration and air purification methods","Technologies":"HEPA filters, pre-filters, air purifiers, ventilation systems","People":"Occupants of buildings, facility managers, maintenance staff","Owner":"Facility managers, building owners"},{"Description":"Use of electrostatic smoke precipitators (ESP) and electrostatic air filters (ES) in built environments","Impact":"Incomplete removal of particulate matter and pollutants, leading to potential health risks and disease transmission","Mitigation":"Regular cleaning and maintenance, use of additional air filtration methods","Technologies":"Electrostatic smoke precipitators (ESP), electrostatic air filters (ES), air purifiers, ventilation systems","People":"Occupants of buildings, facility managers, maintenance staff","Owner":"Facility managers, building owners"}]}
